security: The document contains classified information about a Bureau Source (CSJ 6) providing intelligence on Diaz Lanz. Revealing this source's existence or the information they provided could compromise their safety and the FBI's intelligence-gathering capabilities. Directly quoting: 'Under no circumstances should Bureau Source 6 data be set forth in reports.'
summary: The FBI is investigating Pedro Luis Oscar Diaz Lanz's activities, specifically whether he is in Mexico attempting to purchase an airplane and contact a pilot. The FBI is also concerned about his potential testimony before a Federal grand jury related to the Rundquist-Shergalis matter.
summary_one_paragraph: This FBI file contains airtels between the Director of the FBI and the SAC (Special Agent in Charge) in Miami concerning Pedro Luis Oscar Diaz Lanz, a Cuban individual. The investigation focuses on whether Diaz Lanz is in Mexico attempting to buy an airplane and contact a crop-dusting pilot named Cesar Gomez, based on information from a 'Top Secret' Bureau source. The FBI is also gathering information in anticipation of Diaz Lanz potentially being called as a witness before a Federal grand jury regarding the Rundquist-Shergalis matter, and they require a current report by April 11, 1960.
title: PEDRO LUIS OSCAR DIAZ LANZ
